website_summaries.verdict: The original Scratch Map is still the best.
pros: This classic Scratch Map with gold foil reveals a more colorful and detailed map
Includes trivia about some countries and cities along the bottom of map

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this map and love pulling it out to scratch off when I go places.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Campagna

customer_reviews.title: Great family travel story gift!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift from grandkids to world-traveler grandparents -- we made a game of it, each kid gets to guess a place on the map the grandparent has been to. If they're right, they get to scratch it off and get a story about that trip! Then the next kid's turn. Precious stories and family time.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Vintage-y, cute packaging; great for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend who's traveled all over the world -- came packaged in a vintage-y, cute tube and was delivered rather quickly. It was a little larger than I'd thought, but I think my friend was pleased with it. Will update if I find out more after my friend has used it.
customer_reviews.author: Omega

customer_reviews.title: Must have for avid travelers
customer_reviews.text: I love to travel and I love maps. This is the perfect combination of the two passions. It is so much fun to come home after a trip and scratch off another country. I wish they had the United States scatch-able by state instead of the whole thing in one go. Otherwise is a great product. Sets up interesting conversations when people see it in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Locke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend. She loved it. The tube it comes in is also the shipping container and it doesn't allow you to rip off the shipping label and tape without ruining the outside tube which kinda sucks. The map itself is really nice! It has a prominent border around the countries so you don't over color anything. With that being said, it is tough to scratch off. My friend was scratching off four or five different counties and it took her about 30-45 mins to do with a penny but it sure looks good when it's all done!! Because she liked it so much, I'm going to be buying one for myself!! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is am original lucky map! I really like it, the quality is very good and it was shipped well. You must use a good eraser to scratch off the countries! It has some fun facts for some countries on the bottom to scratch off, nice touch. I like that the scratch off material in the USA is marked with state outlines, so I only scratch off the state's I have traveled to. I did cut mine but it was my choice to fit it in the frame I picked out.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Mapheads
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a friend of mine who is a geography nut and maphead. Obviously, we're talking about the right gift for the right person here but she was simply over the moon about it. She scratched off her last trip already (the coast of Australia and part of New Zealand) and now she's planning on making a running filmogrpahy - a photo every time she scratches off a bit so she can tweet it. As far as I'm concerned, it seems to be fairly good quality and it's a good looking map as the gold leaf is scratched off. Buy this for the right person and you'll be in with the gold. :)
customer_reviews.author: Robin Johnson Esak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to track my travels. Unfortunately, this shows me how much more I have to go. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: My grandparents-in-laws travel everywhere and over the summer they were talking about how they needed a map to mark everywhere they've traveled but thought they'd need too many pins and it would be a pain. I found this map on Amazon and bought it for them for Christmas and they loved it! It comes in a cool tube and the map is a good quality, not cheap at all. I love that it's gold, and then wherever you've been is a bright color so it really pops. Really cool map for a really reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: So Cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for! I wanted a cool map so that I could mark off places around the world (I was going to just put push-pins into it) and Luckies of London had exactly what I wanted and more. With this map, I can scratch off places I've been (just like you would scratch-off a lottery ticket) and "reveal" information on those places. I think this would be an excellent gift to a recent grad who has been bitten by the travel bug or really anyone interested in travel. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C Group

customer_reviews.title: World map
customer_reviews.text: Perfect item for Christmas, i purchased this gift for daughter she's going to be excited when she opens this up,I may give it to her early!, what a great gift for children or adults who like to travel, they can mark each place they've visited.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a traveler
customer_reviews.text: My parents are retired and travel a lot these days. This is going to be a great Christmas gift for them! It’s very pretty I can’t wait to start scratching the locations off with them!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged and good quality feel
customer_reviews.text: Got this map for my daughter’s birthday. We have been traveling internationally since she was 3, so she always wanted a map and something she can marked on. Didn’t know this map existed until recently. She loved it. It was well packaged and looks great on her wall.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Chen

customer_reviews.title: Good durable product
customer_reviews.text: Overall the map seems high quality. Very thick material that seems durable. Was worried it would be easy to scratch off and leave ugly marks in the map but that is not the case. You can scratch off what you want and it is easy not to go into other countries. I think this would make a great gift for anyone who loves traveling or usable wall decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for anyone - a traveler or someone who wants to travel! It comes in an elegantly packaged long tube and unrolls into a truly nice map. It's unique that you can scratch off a location and really makes it personal to the recipient or to yourself. Highly recommend - will be buying more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: ARise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a frequent traveler
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my son,he flies for free, so I'm hoping he'll be able to scratch off quite a few places. It's just such a cool idea! It's made sturdy,nice and thick. I plan on framing it to add to the durability
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my Father as he is a well-traveled man but had no way to keep track of all the places he's been. It is now beautifully displayed in his room and it looks great. I do wish you could tell where the countries start and stop a little better and I wish that every country was a different color rather than having some of them the same color. Overall I believe he is happy with this gift and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Long

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: All countries are of different colors. That makes scratching exciting and makes map look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Esha Patel

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Lovely map, and a great gift for a young traveler.
customer_reviews.author: JennyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend who loves traveling and it was a huge hit. The map comes in a nice protective box and looks very good! It is a great gift or just wall decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came in a cool cylinder and wrapped in a protected wax paper
customer_reviews.text: It came in a cool cylinder and wrapped in a protected wax paper. Came even better than I expected. The gold is perfect. I am so excited to place this in a frame and hang it on the wall. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a unique gift for someone in my life who has been many places around the world. He had fun scratching off the places he has visited and reminiscing, as well as taking note of the places he has not yet explored but would like to. It is a little challenging to see how far to scratch on the map, as the gold scratch overlay doesn't always line up with the map below, but if you are careful it is okay. Arrived safely packaged in a nice tube.
customer_reviews.author: ELRA12

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy. Need to find a better way to ...
customer_reviews.text: This map takes forever to scratch off. You'd need about an hour to uncover America and then it leaves scratches. Not a good buy. Need to find a better way to reveal visited locations (stickers or pins maybe.)
customer_reviews.author: Kate Reuter

customer_reviews.title: I love this map
customer_reviews.text: I love this map. I wish it were more proportionally accurate - Antarctica is massive while some countries in Europe are nearly invisible. Scratch-off comes off fairly easily, but you have to work for it. Both good and bad because you won't accidentally rub it off, but if you try to do it with your nails you won't have any left by the end. Nice compact tube is good for storing the map if you don't have space on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: B J Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Present
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing, I got this for my roommate and I'm wishing I got one for myself too. We travel around a lot together and I thought this would be a cool way to document it! I cannot wait to give it to her and hopefully she will love it enough to frame it. I do not know how well it will hold up but I'm hoping it will and that she will love it. It arrived in good timing for christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: and it was perfect! The map looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad who travels a lot, and it was perfect! The map looks amazing, and the container it comes in looks very legit. Awesome present! I'm thinking about it buying it for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my world traveling sister! She loves it! She also said it was nice to have all the states split out in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Maloney

customer_reviews.title: It is a good size and looks nice on the wall
customer_reviews.text: My jet-setting daughter wanted this map for her room. It is a good size and looks nice on the wall, but it would be more interesting if there were more colors- like for each country instead of just the general area. However, she loves it and wants to travel even more now, just so she can keep scratching!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Barton

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL THING
customer_reviews.text: The Item I received was not a 'Luckies of London' product as advertised or pictured, it was a poorly proportioned, cheaply made knock off, and I was very embarrassed when the person I gave it to opened it. The only reason this is getting two stars is that Amazon gave me a full refund when I sent it back. *After a short search the actual product they sent was a 'AGPtEK® 88.1 x 52cm Scratch Off World Map' on a side note, I would not recommend that one either, for the aforementioned reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!! Unique gift for the traveler.
customer_reviews.text: I love this map. Me and my husband love to travel so this was perfect/ unique way to record or display our adventures. It is worth every cent. The map is well made and was packaged nicely. If you love to travel or know someone who does, you must get!! We are having ours framed.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi J 88

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't exactly line up with the map underneath. ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't exactly line up with the map underneath. But I'm OCD. I only scratched off cities I've been to not the entire country.
customer_reviews.author: Phil C.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister and her husband who love to travel. They thoroughly enjoyed it but wished there was a way to be able to know exactly what they were scratching off... Since they traveled to only parts of countries or cities they didn't want to scratch it all off. Especially in areas where the countries were close together.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for travelers!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for our parents who have been traveling the world. We even got one for ourselves as an inspiration to go on more adventures! I was originally worried that the states would not be outlined, but they are in this version.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Oldroyd

customer_reviews.title: Great :)
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my travelling Dutchman! great quality, we had fun scratching off all the places he's traveled to. def a great gift for someone who likes to travel the gold didn't scratch off as easily as previous reviews had stated. It was great quality and we had to use a quarter to properly get the gold foil off all in all a great, fun gift to give to someone!
customer_reviews.author: Jaykay Bee.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise size and look we're great for office decor
customer_reviews.text: Countries on map are amalgamous blobs, not necessarily accurate shape. No name underneath scratch just color. Otherwise size and look we're great for office decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: THIS MAP IS AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I travel a ton, and collect keychains from every country I go to, but wanted something more. I saw this in my friends dorm room and knew I had to get it. It's fairly expensive for a map, but with the features it has it's worth it. So many people come into my dorm room now and ask about it, and when I explain that the colors are places i've been it sparks so many conversations. Definitely get it if you travel a lot or gift it to someone who does.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: My Traveling Parents Enjoyed It
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my globetrotting parents for Christmas and they had fun scratching stuff off. I had the most confusing call from them though before they started scratching. Something about Brazil and the US touching? It's not clear but either the bodies of water needed to be scratched off as well? Once they started scratching though, they seemed to have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousVerifiedPurchaser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome idea and worka perfectly! very high quality. got it for my fiance who loves travel related things.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hughes

customer_reviews.title: but I loved the look on her face
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the recipient was very excited. I haven't heard an update on the quality, but I loved the look on her face.
customer_reviews.author: CShade

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: In theory this is a great map and was exactly what I was looking for. I found that it is very difficult though to scratch off the various countries. Not worth the effort at all. It was also difficult to get a frame for it without spending a ton of money. I would say look elsewhere or get a custom map made.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: ... on a cruise soon so I thought she'd have fun with this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend for her birthday- she really enjoys travelling and is going on a cruise soon so I thought she'd have fun with this. She's in her 20's and she just loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a world traveling friend for Christmas. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool room deco
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought as a gift but decided to keep for myself. This is a fun way to keep track and show off all the places you've been to!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for someone who travels a lot. He loved it! Scratching big surfaces off took some time but revealing all the colors under the gold scratchable exterior was definitely worth it when we were done. The map was a perfect size as well, not too big and can be easily framed and hung up on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Shaima Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as promised and as other reviewers said. Its a solid little gift that is fun to scratch off. its not detailed so it might not be the best push pin style way to follow your travels. I used it as part of the first anniversary "paper" gift and it was well received.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift to give someone who either loves to travel...or who wants to travel. It's a real incentive to travel and scratch off where you've been. The map comes in a cylinder and opens up into a beautiful map! My friend loved it when she opened up this gift! ehhehee...
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Lundie

customer_reviews.title: looks good and the paper quality is superb
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that the map was really big. looks good and the paper quality is superb. Only one problem though: got frustrated when i realized i've only traveled a very small portion of the world. haha.
customer_reviews.author: cha

customer_reviews.title: Great and cool!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an xmas gift for my sister - she LOVES it! It came in a cool container and she had a blast scratching the places she has been - it's framed in her room and its a great convo piece - everyone comments on it! The only little thing is it came with a few tiny scratches on the map.
customer_reviews.author: vmarie

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for my brother!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my brother, he really likes the size of the map which is currently hanging in his office. As he travels a lot, it is a little game for him to uncover all places where he had been recently.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Remiasova

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone who loves to travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend as a b-day gift. She loves it! Great gift for someone who loves to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a dear friend for Christmas. I am pleased with the cost and my order only took 4 days to reach my home. My only disappointment is that the tube it came in only had one cap when it got here. Small details overall, but it would have been easier to wrap with two caps. I know she'll love it either way and I'd highly suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: unique and a great idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend that loves to travel. She was so excited when she opened this. It was thoughtful, unique and a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: energy118

customer_reviews.title: Love this map
customer_reviews.text: Love this map! I have been order a couple of these for my friends' gift/birthday present/graduation gift. It's a unique map.
customer_reviews.author: aileen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map for my brother who travels to 25 countries per year, at least. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey O'Boyle

customer_reviews.title: good gift
customer_reviews.text: love this map, purchased it as a gift. it looks cool framed in our house, but the amount of places we've traveled looks sooo small since countries like russia and antarctica are so big! wish they had separated all the states in the US. also, be VERY careful taking it out of the package, the slightest scratches show up on the map, i was really bummed about that but i don't notice them too much after framing it.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: fun project
customer_reviews.text: What a fun thing to hang in your house and start conversations with and it just fuels your urge to travel so you can scratch off more places! The map has a plastic coating so you cannot scratch it when you scratch off the part you are supposed to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great for world travelers. Get it for your mom so she can keep track while you adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hallmark

customer_reviews.title: Go to wedding/house-warming present!
customer_reviews.text: We have lots of friends who travel and this is the go-to housewarming/wedding present! Everyone seems to enjoy it. The only down side is that on the world version the USA doesn't have the states delineated.
customer_reviews.author: mathteaches

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This map is beautiful, and I highly recommend it for anyone that wants to track their travels! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way for kids to record our travels!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to purchase this map as a way of recording and looking back over the travels we have made. He is proud of the places that he has visited that some of his friends have not and is eager to scratch off new areas as we explore the world!
customer_reviews.author: JGSquare

customer_reviews.title: Great poster with fine detail
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality of this poster. One word of caution I would mention however is that any little thing can scratch it, including the map itself! I got a big scratch over Russia just by re-rolling it up after opening. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: HHG

customer_reviews.title: That was a disappointment, as part of the reason I purchased the ...
customer_reviews.text: The item description says that it's "Proudly Made In The UK." The item I received was shipped from China ... leading me to believe that it's actually made in china. That was a disappointment, as part of the reason I purchased the item was that it was UK made. I would have returned it, but it was a Christmas gift and I didn't have time to find another gift. If you don't care about the UK thing, it's a decent item.
customer_reviews.author: mike g

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my cousin who loves to travel. It is large enough to see detail. I think it's really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Nice map for travelers
customer_reviews.text: The map is nice, but the borders shown after scratching the map don't always align with the previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Morett

customer_reviews.title: Good present
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my sister as she has really liked it, it's a good size and neat for travelers. No complaints or issues.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea but poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited when I saw the product and couldn't wait to get it. I am disappointed in it. It is extremely hard to scratch. So much so that I gave up after the first country. Also the countries are not clearly marked/outlined like you would expect. Great product idea....poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this poster. I teach Spanish and have it hanging in my classroom! It loods adorable and I love being able to scratch off each new place I go. Great present idea.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the quality of this map
customer_reviews.text: Here's is my advice for this map: don't buy it if it ships from China. After reading many reviews I paid more and bought it from Amazon, not one of the other sellers. The map is on heavy, slick paper. The individual states are outlined although not named. As I bought them as gifts I have not tried scratching anything off, so I can't review that. I am very happy with the quality of this map!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kulik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun to scratch off and looks great in a poster frame and hung in the office
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this product. I love traveling, and I am fortunate enough to have had the opportunity to do so. This is a great piece to have above my desk. I do think it's a bit pricey, but I would purchase this item again, I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: sunkissed

customer_reviews.title: great gift for traveler
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped quickly and was in perfect condition when it arrived. My husband travels the world and loved this map. It was the perfect gift. He enjoys scratching off each country as he visits them.
customer_reviews.author: k.smith

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It makes a GREAT gift for anybody that travels or plans to travel! A fun way to keep track of where you have been and where you want to go!! Love it! It also comes in a sturdy tube to keep it intact and easy to wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Leary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun gift for my niece who's in college in Switzerland and traveling all over the place while there!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Preece

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent map to keep up with travels around the world
customer_reviews.author: L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy paper, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map for my husband as a first (paper) anniversary present. It's great quality! The paper is heavy and the scratch-off coating is good quality and doesn't scratch off incidentally.
customer_reviews.author: mtkreads

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: The map is big and looks great. Te scratch off feature is a cool gimmick and works very well. The person I gave it to travels a lot and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Henree Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for my roommate for our Secret Santa and she really likes it! Immediately she started scratching off the places she's been to and it's a great reason to keep on traveling. The quality of the material is excellent, I was really pleased with it and was very happy to give it as a gift. Like other reviewers have said, the tube for the packaging is very cool and was the first thing that people mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: ndarc2

customer_reviews.title: Great, Just Wish It Was Larger
customer_reviews.text: I love the scratch off map, however, I just wish it was larger.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected from the product, good quality Gold foil stays on pretty well--doesn't flake or come off easily. That being said though, it's harder than you think to scratch off. Overall, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, so much fun
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my office wall. So much fun to keep track of where you have been with it and wow does it show that even though I have been to 27 countries I have just scratched the surface of the globe.
customer_reviews.author: Nichols Brown

customer_reviews.title: great house warming gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift as a house warming gift. I just wish I had it framed for them. They loved it. They do a lot of traveling and couldnt wait to start scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great for any travel lover
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift. Made me a hero! You better be good at geography before you scratch, as it is not clear what exactly is beneath the scratchable area, but it was a huge hit all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fun travel map
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for my girlfriend and it was a big hit. Easy to scratch off with a coin and seems like nice quality. Came packaged in an attractive tube - a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Large map with great value (depending on the price you paid of course)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my uncle. Large map with great value (depending on the price you paid of course). He and his partner love it so far and it encourages them to travel more.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: These maps are great, we bought one for ourselves first and then loved it so much we started buying them as gifts. Great quality and really awesome design.
customer_reviews.author: O. K.

customer_reviews.title: He thought it was fun and different
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He thought it was fun and different. We are excited to track our travels together!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Neeley

customer_reviews.title: we can't find any good way to scratch it off
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, we can't find any good way to scratch it off. A coin doesn't do it, neither does a fingernail. I ended up using a lollipop stick, actually, but it takes a lot of pressure. Also it is very easy to scratch all the way through the color.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Zagorski

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Map
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is such an awesome peice for my college appartment. Its a cause of discussion when new people come to visit, only thing you got to be careful about is DO NOT LET OTHERS TOUCH IT.
customer_reviews.author: rcorbin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Also its always a great conversation starter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: The map looks pretty nice. The scaling looks a tiny bit off in some places, but not enough to really attract attention. However, it's not very easy to scratch off the scratchable portions. Lots of little bits are left behind and scratching too roughly can damage the lamination of the map, resulting in a visibly rough appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Abdulla

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this map. Wish it was harder to scratch because sometimes I got small scuffs putting it back in the frame. Really great quality and color. Got it framed with a removable map, I think it looks pretty elegant. Great way to show off your travels!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Stursa

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the traveller
customer_reviews.text: Daughter adored it! Arrived in perfection condition. Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.author: helen Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My roommate loved it for secret Santa, she's been all over the world so it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: what a fun way to keep track of where you have been and where to go next
customer_reviews.author: RChriv

customer_reviews.title: As says
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging for this. It makes a wonderful gift as is. I can not wait to give this to the bf.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a much higher quality product than I thought. The container it came in was strong and sturdy. The poster itself is also strong and sturdy. I didn't have any problems with the map being scratched in places.
customer_reviews.author: TravelGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my world-travelling brother. He loves it, makes a great gift for the person who likes to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't scratched anything off yet because it looks too nice to touch! The paper is very thick and has a very nice gloss to it. The can it comes in is very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Makes you want to go somewhere
customer_reviews.text: hard to tell where the boundaries of places are. lots of fun to scratch
customer_reviews.author: J. Collum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for any traveller
customer_reviews.text: I've now bought this is a gift and for myself, and it's a wonderful addition for anyone looking for travel inspiration.
customer_reviews.author: valleyc

product_meta.title: Scratch Map Original Scratch off Map, Personalized World Travel Map Poster with countries, states, cities, Manufactured in the UK
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL SCRATCH OFF MAP – The Scratch Map was conceived in 2009, designed and manufactured by Luckies of London, the World’s first scratch off travel map.

PERSONALIZED SCRATCH OFF WORLD MAP – The Original Scratch Map is a map of the world with intricate geographical detail. Designed by expert cartographers, a high quality map featuring countries, states, borders, cities, capitals, oceans, islands, and more including travel trivia.

SCRATCH OFF WHERE YOU'VE BEEN – Bring your globetrotting adventures to life by recording a lifetime of travels with the Scratch Map. Scratch off the top foil layer to reveal a bright new colorful world and watch your travels and past adventures come to life

PLAN YOUR TRAVELS – If you’re about to embark on a trip of a lifetime, a globetrotting expedition across the globe or island hoping around the Balearics, the Original Scratch Map allows you to create a visual travel itinerary, a world first.

PREMIUM QUALITY SCRATCH MAPs – Luckies of London manufacture an extensive collection of scratch maps, manufactured to the highest standard using premium quality materials to create the world’s finest scratchable map.
